ygData.subject: Re: Need to find Diamond Dust!! Plz Help!
ygData.msgSnippet: Is worth a mint? I am curious what are diamonds worth, I am kinda poor from dumping so much into tinkering. I know the diamond is one component of the quest
ygData.messageBody:
Is worth a mint? I am curious what are diamonds worth, I am kinda poor from
dumping so much into tinkering. I know the diamond is one component of the
quest which also requires scales from the dragon Nag (I believe dragon scale
tunic or something like that)

Any price estimate would help greatly.
Thanks
----- Original Message -----
From: Garett <osmosis@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, November 08, 1999 2:32 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Need to find Diamond Dust!! Plz Help!


> From: "Garett" <osmosis@...>
>
> no diamond is a jewelcraft item, it creates items with all saves (sv
> magic/disease/fire/cold/poison)
>
> its also worth a mint!!!
>
> Cogg - Rallos Zek
>
> ----- Original Message -----
